zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[短期看跌，需关注支撑位]
zh.content:
当前AVAX/USD的价格为13.0713，较24小时前下降了1.94%。从高点13.3451和低点12.96来看，市场呈现出一定的震荡下行趋势。短期内，市场情绪偏向看跌，投资者需谨慎操作。

技术指标方面，MACD目前显示为负值-0.040327601，表明短期内卖压较强。由于RSI(14)数据缺失，我们无法准确判断超买或超卖状态。SMA(20)为13.39524，价格已低于该均线，进一步确认了短期内的下行压力。

在支撑和阻力位方面，当前的支撑位在12.96附近，若价格跌破此位，可能会加速下行。阻力位则在13.3451，若价格企稳并突破该水平，可能会引发短期反弹。投资者应密切关注这两个关键价位的变化。

综合来看，建议投资者在当前市场环境下，采取观望策略，等待更清晰的信号再做决策。如果价格接近支撑位且出现反弹迹象，可以考虑小规模入场；反之，则应做好止损准备，控制风险。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at $13.0713, reflecting a 24-hour change of -1.94%. The price action suggests a bearish trend in the short term, particularly after reaching a high of $13.3451 and a low of $12.96 within the same period. This volatility indicates market uncertainty, and traders should closely monitor the price movement for signs of potential reversal or continuation. A sustained break below the recent low could signal further downside momentum.

The 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) stands at $13.39524, acting as a key resistance level. If the price can reclaim this SMA, it may indicate a shift in sentiment and provide an opportunity for a bullish reversal. Conversely, the current price is below this level, suggesting that sellers remain in control. The MACD value of -0.0403 indicates bearish momentum, though without a signal line for comparison, caution is advised when interpreting this indicator.

In terms of support and resistance, the immediate support level is around $12.96, which has previously held during recent sell-offs. If this level breaks, the next support could be found at $12.50. Traders should watch for price action around these levels to gauge potential buying or selling opportunities. On the resistance side, the previous high of $13.3451 will be critical; failure to breach this level may lead to further retracement.

For traders looking to enter the market, a conservative approach would involve waiting for confirmation of a bullish reversal, ideally with price action above the 20-day SMA. Conversely, if the price approaches the support level of $12.96 and shows signs of rejection, this could present a buying opportunity. Always consider stop-loss orders to manage risk effectively in this volatile market environment.
